ComicInfo.Summary: This is the story of a millennia-old battle between godlike beings, with all sentient life caught in their path. After a near-death experience from her battles against the servants of Kako, Taarna dons her all-new, celestial armor to fight a bloody and terrible war. Can the last Taarakian and her ally, the young woman called Shaan, stop the army of Urcuss? The final act of Taarna's new adventures begins!

ComicInfo.Title: Redemption
